testCase.name: LeaseService Service Import should import leaseService successfully
LeaseService getLeasesByAdminId should throw error when adminId is missing
LeaseService getLeasesByAdminId should fetch leases for admin successfully
LeaseService getLeasesByAdminId should update lease status when it changes
LeaseService getLeasesByAdminId should handle leases with missing booking details
LeaseService createLease should throw error when bookingID is missing
LeaseService createLease should throw error when booking is not found
LeaseService createLease should create lease successfully with valid booking
LeaseService createLease should throw error when user is not found
LeaseService createLease should throw error when listing is not found
LeaseService updateLeaseStatusesByAdmin should update statuses for admin leases only
LeaseService updateAllLeaseStatuses should update all lease statuses across all admins
LeaseService countActiveLeasesByAdminId should count active leases for admin successfully
LeaseService countActiveLeasesByAdminId should return 0 when no active leases found
LeaseService countActiveLeasesByAdminId should handle database errors gracefully
LeaseService getLeasedPropertyPercentage should calculate leased property percentage successfully
LeaseService getLeasedPropertyPercentage should return 0 when admin has no properties
LeaseService getLeasedPropertyPercentage should return 0 when admin has no active leases
LeaseService getLeasedPropertyPercentage should handle 100% leased scenario
LeaseService getLeasedPropertyPercentage should handle database errors gracefully
BookingService Service Import should import bookingService successfully
BookingService getBookings should fetch bookings for admin successfully
BookingService getBookings should filter out bookings not belonging to admin
BookingService getBookings should handle missing tenant information gracefully
BookingService getBookings should calculate nights correctly
BookingService getBookings should handle database errors gracefully
BookingService getCurrentMonthRevenue should calculate current month revenue for admin successfully
BookingService getCurrentMonthRevenue should return 0 when no bookings found for current month
BookingService getCurrentMonthRevenue should exclude invalid booking statuses
BookingService getCurrentMonthRevenue should handle invalid date formats gracefully
BookingService getCurrentMonthRevenue should handle database errors gracefully
BookingService getCurrentMonthRevenue should return 0 when admin has no listings
ListingService Service Import should import service successfully
ListingService createListing should throw error when required fields are missing
ListingService createListing should throw error when price is invalid
ListingService createListing should throw error when price is zero or negative
ListingService createListing should create listing successfully with valid data
ListingService createListing should handle amenities array normalization
ListingService getListingsByAdminId should fetch listings for admin successfully
ListingService getListingsByAdminId should handle database errors gracefully
ListingService countNumberOfListingsByAdminId should count listings for admin successfully
ListingService countNumberOfListingsByAdminId should return 0 when no listings found
ListingService countNumberOfListingsByAdminId should handle database errors gracefully
ListingService countListingsAddedThisMonth should count listings added this month successfully
ListingService countListingsAddedThisMonth should return 0 when no listings added this month
ListingService countListingsAddedThisMonth should handle different months correctly
ListingService countListingsAddedThisMonth should handle February (leap year) correctly
ListingService countListingsAddedThisMonth should handle database errors gracefully
ListingService getListingById should fetch listing by ID successfully
ListingService getListingById should return null when listing not found
ListingService getListingById should handle database errors gracefully
ListingService deleteListingById should delete listing successfully
ListingService deleteListingById should return false when listing not found
ListingService deleteListingById should handle database errors gracefully
ListingService deleteListingById should log activity when deleting listing
InvoiceService Service Import should import invoiceService successfully
InvoiceService createInvoice should throw error when required fields are missing
InvoiceService createInvoice should throw error when lease is not found
InvoiceService createInvoice should create invoice successfully with valid data
InvoiceService createInvoice should auto-generate description when not provided
InvoiceService createInvoice should validate inputs
InvoiceService getInvoicesByAdminId should throw error when adminId is missing
InvoiceService getInvoicesByAdminId should fetch and update invoices successfully
InvoiceService getInvoicesByAdminId should update invoice status when it changes
InvoiceService getInvoicesByAdminId should handle invoices with missing date gracefully
InvoiceService markInvoiceAsPaid should mark invoice as paid successfully
InvoiceService markInvoiceAsPaid should throw error when invoice not found
InvoiceService getInvoiceStats should return formatted invoice statistics
InvoiceService getInvoiceStats should handle missing status categories
InvoiceService regenerateAllInvoiceDescriptions should regenerate descriptions for all invoices
InvoiceService regenerateAllInvoiceDescriptions should regenerate descriptions for specific admin
Revenue Service Tests Revenue Calculation should calculate monthly revenue for admin
Revenue Service Tests Revenue Calculation should store monthly revenue in database
Revenue Service Tests Revenue Calculation should retrieve stored revenue data
Revenue Service Tests Revenue Calculation should get revenue trend for last 12 months
Revenue Service Tests Database Operations should get collection statistics
Revenue Service Tests Scheduled Tasks should manually trigger revenue calculation
Revenue Service Edge Cases should handle admin with no listings
Revenue Service Edge Cases should handle invalid date parameters
MaintenanceService Service Import should import maintenanceService successfully
MaintenanceService getAllMaintenanceRequests should throw error when adminId is missing
MaintenanceService getAllMaintenanceRequests should return empty array when no maintenance requests found
MaintenanceService getAllMaintenanceRequests should fetch maintenance requests successfully
MaintenanceService getAllMaintenanceRequests should handle missing user information gracefully
MaintenanceService getAllMaintenanceRequests should handle maintenance requests with missing newMaintenanceRequest fields
MaintenanceService getAllMaintenanceRequests should handle database errors gracefully
MaintenanceService countMaintenanceRequestsByAdminId should count maintenance requests for admin successfully
MaintenanceService countMaintenanceRequestsByAdminId should return 0 when no maintenance requests found
MaintenanceService countMaintenanceRequestsByAdminId should handle database errors gracefully
MaintenanceService countHighPriorityMaintenanceRequestsByAdminId should count high priority maintenance requests successfully
MaintenanceService countHighPriorityMaintenanceRequestsByAdminId should return 0 when no high priority requests found
MaintenanceService countHighPriorityMaintenanceRequestsByAdminId should handle database errors gracefully
ActivityService Service Import should import activityService successfully
ActivityService getRecentActivities should throw error when adminId is missing
ActivityService getRecentActivities should fetch recent activities successfully with default limit
ActivityService getRecentActivities should fetch recent activities with custom limit
ActivityService getRecentActivities should return empty array when no activities found
ActivityService getRecentActivities should handle database errors gracefully
ActivityService getRecentActivities should handle invalid adminId format
UserService Service Import should import userService successfully
UserService register should throw error when required fields are missing
UserService register should handle fullname parsing correctly
UserService login should throw error when required fields are missing
UserService login should handle email login successfully
UserService resetPassword should throw error when email is missing
UserService resetPassword should call email handler for valid request
